com.google.appinventor.client.editor
Class ProjectEditor

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              com.google.appinventor.client.editor.ProjectEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasAttachHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, IsWidget
Direct Known Subclasses:
YaProjectEditor
public abstract class ProjectEditor
extends Composite

Abstract superclass for all project editors. Each ProjectEditor is associated with a single project and may have multiple FileEditors open in a DeckPanel with a TabBar used to control which widget in the DeckPanel is visible.

Author:
lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

public abstract void loadProject()
Loads the project into the project editor. This may result in multiple FileEditors being added.

getFileEditor

public final FileEditor getFileEditor(String fileId)
Returns the file editor for the given file ID.

Parameters:
fileId - file ID of the file

closeFileEditor

public final void closeFileEditor(String fileId)
Closes the file editor for the given file ID, without saving. This is used when the file is about to be deleted.

Parameters:
fileId - file ID of the file to be closed
